body.p: The purpose of the JSON schema is to define the legal properties and values of a JSON document to keep it valid and well-formed. When editing JSON Schema, all of the same features in the JSON editor are available.

section.title: Text Mode Editor
section.p:
When editing JSON Schema documents in Text editing mode, the usual text editing actions are available, along with other editor-specific actions, including:
Search and Find/Replace
Drag and Drop
Validation
Format and Indent (Pretty Print)

section.title: Author Visual Editor
section.p: It is also possible to edit JSON files in the visual Author editing mode. uses a specific CSS for rendering JSON Schema documents in Author mode and you have access to the various features and actions that are available when editing XML documents in Author mode.

section.title: New Document Templates
section.p: includes a new document template to help you get started creating a JSON Schema document. The template is called JSON Schema and it can be found in the New Document folder in the New document wizardNew from templates wizard. You can also customize your own JSON Schema templates and specify other versions (draft 04, 06, or 07).You can experiment with a sample of a JSON Schema file available at: [OXYGEN-INSTALL-DIR]/samples/json/personal-schema.json.
